title: Multiple Offer | Endowus | IBM | New relic | Deliveroo | ServiceNow
content:
* Education: Tier1
* Years of Experience: 3+ yrs
* Prior Experience: Some cloud company

### Endowus

* Date of the Offer: Jan 2024 
* Company: Endowus
* Title/Level: SDE2
* Location: Hyderabad 
* Salary: INR 33,00,000
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: Not asked. They might have given
* Stock bonus: ESOP valued at USD7,600 
* Bonus: Variable 8Lakhs
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 33,00,000
* Other details: Declined 


### IBM

* Date of the Offer: March 2024 
* Company: IBM
* Title/Level: Backend engineer
* Location: Bengaluru 
* Salary: INR 30,00,000
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: INR 20,00,000 (Split in 2 years)
* Stock bonus: INR 16,00,000 (Split in 4 years)
* Bonus: Variable 12% of basic
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 44,00,000 for 1st year
* Other details: Declined due to low brand value and 3 months notice period. Also after 2 years compensation will Decrease a lot


### New relic

* Date of the Offer: March 2024 
* Company: New relic
* Title/Level: SDE2
* Location: Hyderabad 
* Salary: INR 36,00,000
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: INR 3,50,000
* Stock bonus:None
* Bonus: Variable 5%
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 39,50,000


### Deliveroo

* Date of the Offer: March 2024 
* Company: Deliveroo
* Title/Level: L4
* Location: Hyderabad 
* Salary: INR 39,13,000
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: INR 2,50,000 relocation ( they do not give this but handle everything for you)
* Stock bonus: None
* Bonus: Variable 10%
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 39,13,000


### Servicenow

* Date of the Offer: March 2024 
* Company: Servicenow
* Title/Level: SSE
* Location: Hyderabad 
* Salary: INR 31,00,000
* Relocation/Signing Bonus:  Relocation assistance + INR 40k
* Stock bonus: Rs 40,00,000 (4 years)
* Bonus: INR 3,10,000 lakhs
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 44,00,000



Confused between New relic , Deliveroo, Servicenow. Which one to join? Any suggestion?

title: Paypal | Sr. Software Engineer | T24 | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech in ECE
Years of Experience: 5~
Prior Experience: VMware TC: 20.5 lakhs per annum (total CTC + RSUs)

Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: Paypal
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer (T24)
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: Base 29L INR
Relocation Bonus: N.A
Signing Bonus: N.A
Stock bonus: 45000$ (3 years)
Bonus: 10%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 44LPA
Benefits: Standard PayPal Benefits
Other details: Also Microsoft offer https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5045467/

Not able to decide which is better - PayPal or Microsoft?

title: Microsoft | SDE 2 | L61 | Hyderabad
content:
Education: BTech in ECE
Years of Experience: 5~
Prior Experience: VMware TC: 20.5 lakhs per annum (total CTC + RSUs)

Date of the Offer: April 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE 2 (L61)
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: Base 30L INR
Relocation Bonus: 1.18L INR (taxable) + 5L INR (gross)
Signing Bonus: 5L ( 3L first year + 2L second year )
Stock bonus: 60000$ (4 years)
Bonus: 0 - 20%
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 56.48 Lakhs first year + 49.3 Lakhs second year
Benefits: Standard Microsoft Benefits
Other details: Feedback from interview is very good. I am also holding offer from Paypal https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5045806/. I am sad that Microsoft offering very low designation for my experience and offering same stocks as Paypal even after sharing this offer.
salaryTotal: : 56.48 Lakhs First Year + 49.3 Lakhs Second Year
